name: Plankton Is Not Dead
description:
Disclaimer: This fan made game contains loud noises, jumpscares and screams!

You must bring back 5 krabby patties to krusty krab before Plankton find you.

This fan made spongebob game is made in about 1 day.

You have 3 gamemodes:

-Easy

-Medium

-Hard

Models:

-Model Resources

Music and SFX:

-Free sounds org, youtube
